name: SpaceTime Solver
description:
2021 Epic MegaJam

Solve puzzles using the abilities of spacetime! There may be more than one solution!

Walkthrough video:

I saved the best puzzles for last, but the thing about saving the best for last is that if you don't finish them, then it won't make it into the game!  I thought I'd be able complete the ones I had planned for, but the last few took longer than expected. So yeah, there are a few good stages that I couldn't implement into the jam; and there are a lot of other things I would've liked to add as well! But instead of listing them all out in judging period, I hope the judges can consider what HAS been done!

Also didn't have time to put a pop-out information on the equip skills menu so here's a bit more information on it!

Rewind (hold) - Rewinds position of objects at TWICE the speed

Dash - Moves you forward a certain distance

Speed boost - Makes you move faster

Slow time - Slows time

Recall - Relocates your position to where you were before a few seconds ago. (You have to be moving in order to activate it!)

Other notes

Press the esc key to open up the menu and restart a level if you need to.

The giant red balls are intentionally not affected by rewind.

You can watch my devlog (except for the last few hours of the jam where I would've had to stop stream too many times to go on messages tab) here:

VSimCardV - Twitch
